Title: The Price of Hope
Description:
$n, good to see you. I am about to make a trip to the local infirmary. 

Would you care to join me?
ObjectivesText: Meet General Steelstrike in the Mereldar Infirmary.
CompletionText: We lose so many, we need to save those we can.
RewardText: Thank you. If you can come back and help Kaeleb another day, it would be much appreciated.

Objectives.Text: Meet the General at the Infirmary
